ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Several utility functions for the book entitled  "Practices of Medical and Health Data Analysis using R" (Pearson Education Japan, 2007) with Japanese demographic data and some demographic analysis related functions.

Several utility functions for the book entitled  "Practices of Medical and Health Data Analysis using R" (Pearson Education Japan, 2007) with Japanese demographic data and some demographic analysis related functions.

name: r-fmsb
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.7.6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-fmsb
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/fmsb_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/fmsb/fmsb_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e57df29d44d988ec977b3d7a6250e5d647ae8572bc41240bb86290252d79d3b2

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('fmsb')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('fmsb')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://minato.sip21c.org/msb/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Several utility functions for the book entitled  "Practices of Medical and Health Data Analysis using R" (Pearson Education Japan, 2007) with Japanese demographic data and some demographic analysis related functions.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jenzopr

# Package: fmsb
# Version: 0.6.3
# Date: 2018-04-2
# Title: Functions for Medical Statistics Book with some Demographic Data
# Author: Minato Nakazawa <minato-nakazawa@umin.net>
# Maintainer: Minato Nakazawa <minato-nakazawa@umin.net>
# Depends: R (>= 2.2.0)
# Description: Several utility functions for the book entitled "Practices of Medical and Health Data Analysis using R" (Pearson Education Japan, 2007) with Japanese demographic data and some demographic analysis related functions.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://minato.sip21c.org/msb/
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-04-03 10:03:30 UTC; Minato
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-04-03 21:37:31 UTC
